text: Melanie Palenik (born 1966) is an American freestyle skier and world champion. She competed at the FIS Freestyle World Ski Championships 1986 in Tignes, in aerials and moguls. She won a gold medal in combined at the FIS Freestyle World Ski Championships 1989 in Oberjoch, and a bronze medal in aerials, while placing tenth in moguls and tenth in ballet. She also took part in the FIS Freestyle World Ski Championships 1991 in Lake Placid, New York, where she placed 8th in moguls. == References == == External links == * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:American female freestyle skiers
title: Melanie Palenik
